es.osoco.grails.plugins.concordion.extensions
[Groovy] Class ConfigurableLoggingTooltipExtensionFactory

java.lang.Object
  es.osoco.grails.plugins.concordion.extensions.ConfigurableExtensionFactory
      ConfigurableLoggingTooltipExtensionFactory

class ConfigurableLoggingTooltipExtensionFactory
extends ConfigurableExtensionFactory

This class implements the org.concordion.api.extension.ConcordionExtensionFactory interface to create a org.concordion.api.extension.LoggingTooltipExtension following the configuration values specified in the Grails application's Config.groovy. By default, this factory creates an extension that will add screenshots to the output whenever an assertion fails, or an uncaught Throwable occurs in the test.

Authors:
Rafael Luque
